name: Straight To Bootleg, Vol. 01
description:
Big Phony

"Straight to Bootleg, Vol. 01"

Track Listing:

1. Someone
2. Words That Define
3. Talk of the Town
4. I Love Lucy
5. Girls Like You Don't Go For Guys Like Me
6. Proof By Name
7. The Bully
8. Here's to the Laughable State
9. Still No. 1
10. Fix Or Providence
11. How to Die
12. Fifteen Minutes
13. All In A Day (All In A Day)
14. Talk of the Town (Studio Take)
15. Here's to the Laughable State (Studio Take)

“Straight to Bootleg, Volume 01″ (2008) is a collection of demos and home recordings.  A lot of these tracks are in its purest form.  Many written and recorded all in one short sitting.  Stripped down, simple, sometimes audibly “crappy” but honest.  You can hear police sirens in one song because windows were left open.  There are a few bonus studio recordings worked on with Koo Chung, who also produced Big Phony's first album “Fiction & Other Realities.

info@bigphonymusic.com
www.bigphonymusic.com

All songs written and performed by Robert Choy (Big Phony)
℗ & © 2008 Robert Choy / Big Phony   All Rights Reserved

Art Direction by Brian Won www.natl.tv

name: Fiction & Other Realities
description:
Big Phony

“Fiction & Other Realities″

Track Listing:

1. Beautiful The Freak
2. Dying Unaware
3. Holiday Bust
4. Parade In My Head
5. Push
6. Parable
7. The Last Day of the Season
8. The Girl by the Bridge
9. Everything-Always

"Fiction & Other Realities" is the first project of New York City native singer/songwriter "Big Phony." Teaming up with Koo Chung, producer and long-time friend, together they worked on this 9 track album/demo early 2005.

Big Phony's music/lifestyle in one way or another has been influenced by the likes of singer-songwriters such as Elliott Smith, Aimee Mann, Nick Drake, and of bands like The Beatles, Radiohead, and Milli Vanilli. 

info@bigphonymusic.com
www.bigphonymusic.com

All songs written and performed by Robert Choy (Big Phony)
℗ & © 2005 Robert Choy / Big Phony   All Rights Reserved
